information: H.C.Buhle GmbH was founded in 1889 and is now a separate legal company. The business provides solutions in the areas of mixing, flavouring and packaging tea products to customer requirements. Since 1957, Felix P. Wesenberg GmbH & Co. KG has been our contact partner for importing and exporting high-quality tea goods. Founded by Felix Paul Wesenberg, the company combines a century-old tradition of tea indulgence from a company managed in its second generation with the modern logistics of a globalised world. You can also take a look at our partner company's website.
